title: A1 Speaking
description: Speaking practice to help you learn useful language for everyday communication. Situations include meeting new people, checking understanding and making suggestions.

title: A2 Speaking
description: Speaking practice to help you learn useful language for everyday communication. Situations include showing interest, talking about where you're from and talking about your job.

title: B1 Speaking
description: Reading practice to help you understand texts with everyday or job-related language. Texts include articles, travel guides, emails, adverts and reviews.

title: B2 Speaking
description: Speaking practice to help you learn useful language for everyday communication. Situations include responding to news, meeting face-to-face and asking a favour.

title: C1 Speaking
description: Speaking practice to help you learn useful language for everyday communication. Situations include giving advice, dealing with a problem and challenging someone's ideas.
